H3.text: who did the united states fight in the war of 1812. United Kingdom

A4.text: The War of 1812 was fought by the United States and its allies against the United Kingdom and its allies in North America.

A5.text: The United States was only a secondary concern to Britain, so long as the Napoleonic Wars continued with France.
